parameters.name: TemplateName
parameters.description: Fully qualified path and name of the title block table template

parameters.name: X
parameters.description: x coordinate for upper-left corner of title block table

parameters.name: Y
parameters.description: y coordinate for upper-left corner of title block table

title: IModelDocExtension.InsertTitleBlockTable
description: Inserts a title block table in a part or assembly document.
signature:
TitleBlockTableAnnotation InsertTitleBlockTable( 
   System.String
TemplateName
,
   System.Int32
X
,
   System.Int32
Y
)

parameters.name: TemplateName
parameters.description: Fully qualified path and name of the title block table template

parameters.name: X
parameters.description: x coordinate for upper-left corner of title block table

parameters.name: Y
parameters.description: y coordinate for upper-left corner of title block table

remarks:
Title block table templates have a filename extension of
.sldtbt
.
